storyInfo: Nine leaves the L.G.D. because of her infection, leaving Ch'en with heavy blows to her confidence. Where should she go from here?

attributes.content: I'll repeat again, so listen up. 'My wish is to join the L.G.D., and from there, I'll join the Special Inspection Unit.'
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I will protect this city, and I'll clean this place up. There won't be another incident like that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...But we are ready to make headways in the slums. There's also that housing plan for the Infected, ready to be launched. Wouldn't you say we're in a better shape than before?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We are more than ready to treat all the Infected fairly and equally. We will give everyone in Lungmen a fair treatment regardless of whether they are Infected or not, because they are all people of Lungmen!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Sure, we may be ready, but is Lungmen ready? Are the masses ready? Will the Chamber of Commerce vote for it? What do you think will happen if I tell the L.G.D. that I'm Infected?
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: Nine, you knew right from the start that I was never going to succeed.
And so, why help me?
Ch'en... Superintendent Ch'en...
Well, what a surprise. I sure didn't expect to find Superintendent Ch'en, our department's proud workaholic, faffing about here.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Swire, you should be standing by on the outskirts of the slums.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm just about done there. It's why I'm here to give you a holler.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What happened to using comms? Pretty sure you get a decent signal in the slums.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I wanted to see you cry your heart out with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Stop trying to hide it, Ch'en Hui-chieh. Nine was your cheerleader. You always counted on her having your back, and the new Infected housing plan was the one thing weighing on your mind all this year.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And now, Nine's resigned, and the bill didn't pass. What do you think I mean?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: She's not my cheerleader.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And I suppose neither is Chief Wei, hm?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You were a fresh face with an empty file, barely on the job for two years before breaking the record for fastest promotion to the Special Inspection Unit. And then you became the strongest proponent of the new Infected housing plan.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Looks like you hold a real grudge against me for beating you on the entrance exams. Seems the princess of the Schwire family doesn't have much patience.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hmph, I admit my skills are no match for yours.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I certainly didn't expect that, outside the L.G.D., the first time I heard someone mention your name would be at a party, though.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en Hui-chieh, do you know why?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: It was that bill.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: They said that it was like you thought you had free rein to do whatever you wanted because both Chief Wei and Nine had your back.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Then they clinked their glasses, self-satisfyingly joked about how full of yourself you are, and went off on their merry way.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm full of myself...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Right, that's what they thought of all the hard work you poured into this. They didn't even mention you again.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And if you're still planning on faffing about here, let me tell you that the other thing you've been planning for so long—sending the L.G.D. into the slums—won't ever happen.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: We have several squads ready, but Nine is gone. You're the leader now, and everyone is waiting on you.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.text: But what if I am wrong?

attributes.content: I don't need you to tell me what to do.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I should certainly hope not.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Missy, how come you didn't tell her about the part where you walked up and threw your wine in their faces?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'm not here to console her or talk about our common enemy. I'm here to laugh in her face.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: And she's the one in charge of today's operation. Am I supposed to lead this thing for her, if she can't get her arse moving?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You don't think she did anything wrong, though, am I right?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Since I was little, I've seen a lot of people try to put on an act for my grandfather, like they're trying to accomplish something big.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Most of them were phony, though. All in it for the money.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: He must be very insightful, then.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I have no idea how insightful he is, but it's thanks to him that I can tell when someone's putting on a show.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: So what about Ch'en?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Her?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Completely clueless.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Haha, can't deny that.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Let's go. We've got lots to do today.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en, the establishment of L.G.D. offices in the slums marks a big day.
attributes.name: Reporter

attributes.content: Could you share how you're feeling right now?
attributes.name: Reporter

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Out of the way.
attributes.name: Policeman A

attributes.content: Hey, no pushing!
attributes.name: Reporter

attributes.content: Oops, no idea where that one came from.
attributes.name: Policeman A

attributes.content: Didn't I say to keep the reporters away?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: We tried, Superintendent Ch'en, but the L.G.D. setting up shop in the slums is a big deal. There's no way to keep all the flies out.
attributes.name: Policeman A

attributes.content: They're all waiting for us to embarrass ourselves.
attributes.name: Policeman B

attributes.content: Uh... I'm not saying there's anything wrong with the plan. It's just, Nine quit all of a sudden, and you are one of the proponents of the Infected housing plan. Things are going to get intense.
attributes.name: Policeman B

attributes.text: The Infected housing plan, the L.G.D. moving into the slums. They're the talk of the town.
Like the hottest new toys in the shops.

attributes.content: Let them take their pictures.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Get in formation.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Here!
attributes.name: Policemen

attributes.content: The slums have always been a sore spot for the L.G.D.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The slums are run by criminals, the slums are home to the Infected, and the slums are outside the law... The slums are a problem for Lungmen.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I know that a lot of you don't understand why we're here.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But I must say this. Those of us who live in the urban districts must take some responsibility for how things turned out.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's because we've never treated the slums as a part of Lungmen.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: From this day forward, we will show the people here, by way of our actions, that they are part of Lungmen, and Lungmen will treat them as equals.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Is that understood?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: Policemen

attributes.text: I can hear them gossip amongst themselves.
Is it because my conviction is not firm enough?

attributes.content: Everything aside, I don't know whether we see the slum dwellers as equals, but there are certain people out there who definitely treat us as equals.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Wherever we are and whatever it is we're doing, trouble will always find us.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And since today's our grand opening in the slums, you know those friends of ours who don't see eye to eye with us? We'll definitely get a surprise gift from them.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: No need to think too much about it, folks. If they come, we'll take care of them.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And I'll take you all out to dinner when we're done.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What are we eating?
attributes.name: Policeman A

attributes.content: Whatever they serve at the dai pai dongs.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Policemen

attributes.content: If you guys can convince Ch'en to pitch in, we might go a little more upscale. Am I right, Ch'en?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en, what do you say?
attributes.name: Policeman B

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Haha, that's what I'm talking about.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Who is it?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en. Your boy Phal is here with us. If you don't want anything to happen to him, come alone.
Where?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Such a quick response. I should've expected no less from you, Superintendent Ch'en.
Make your way to the location you just received. If we do not see you there in half an hour, I'm afraid Phal won't make it out of this alive.
Understood.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What's the matter, Ch'en?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Trouble just found us.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Need me to come with you?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: No. I can deal with them myself. You have command here.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Everyone, it's time to clean up.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Yessir!
attributes.name: Policemen

attributes.content: I'm here. Alone. No one else's coming.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en...
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Ah Phal, is it just you here?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Deoi m zyu, Ch'en.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: You sold me out, huh?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The dai lo of the Anchors told me to hide here and blow you up. If I don't, they'll kill my mother.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: They know you're the one who cares the most about this L.G.D. in the slums thing, and that it'll all fall apart once they take you out.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: You'll lose your hand before you can press the button.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't do anything stupid.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I don't have the remote, and even if you kill me, the guys outside will set the bombs off. You're the one who shouldn't do anything stupid, Ch'en.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Why you...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't blame me.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: I've known you were good ever since Madame Oni introduced us. Some of the other guys in the slums know it too, but most don't.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: You knew the triad bosses here wouldn't just sit by and let the L.G.D. waltz into their territory.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: What you don't know, though, is that even the normal folks who live here don't believe the L.G.D. is moving into the slums for any good reason.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: They think they're here to take our last bit of freedom away.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: I didn't mean...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I know that isn't what you had in mind.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: But they don't.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Please, I'm begging you, Superintendent Ch'en.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: You're a good person. I don't want anything to happen to you.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Send a message out, and tell the ah sirs outside to pack up and never come back.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Bringing the L.G.D. into the slums isn't going to do any of us any good.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Even if you make it through today, you won't make it through tomorrow.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: You know how ruthless the dai los are. The methods they'll use to chase out the L.G.D. will turn your stomach!
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Did you think... I'd just say 'okay'?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I followed Madame Oni for so long. I just want to turn over a new leaf myself, Superintendent!
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Don't force my hand.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: An explosion? I didn't...
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Get down!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Gah, is it the Anchors?!
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Watch out, Ch'en. It's the...
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Ch'en? Ch'ennn!
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.text: Nine, is everything I'm doing here actually meaningless?
Am I just a joke to you?

attributes.content: She's still breathing. She's just unconscious.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: She probably got hurt shielding me. What should I do? What am I supposed to tell Madame Oni if something happens to Superintendent Ch'en...?
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: What's to tell? You're both dying here.
attributes.name: Infected Thug

attributes.content: You... You're with the Anchors... Didn't we agree I'd do this myself?!
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: The dai lo doesn't trust you. That's why we're here.
attributes.name: Infected Thug

attributes.content: Didn't we agree to blow her up the moment she steps inside? What are you doing here, having a nice little chat with her, hm?
attributes.name: Infected Thug

attributes.content: Ch'en isn't that gullible. I was trying to lure her somewhere I knew she'd get caught in the explosion.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Is that so? Then how come she's lying on the ground, right after I pressed the button without a second thought?
attributes.name: Infected Thug

attributes.content: Go, see if she's dead yet.
attributes.name: Infected Thug

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Infected Henchman

attributes.content: Not so fast, Lee Bo-faat. Don't forget, we've got your mother.
attributes.name: Infected Thug

attributes.content: She just passed out.
attributes.name: Infected Henchman

attributes.content: She's not dead? Whatever, take her back and let the dai lo deal with her.
attributes.name: Infected Thug

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Infected Henchman

attributes.content: Who is it?! Who dares step up against the Anchors?!
attributes.name: Infected Thug

attributes.content: Well, I have to hand it to you people. You've got some nerve, trying to rub out an L.G.D. Special Inspection Unit officer in broad daylight.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I wonder if people might talk about the Rat King keeping his own men in check, if word about this got out.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Miss Lin! Th-This isn't what it looks like. Our boss's just inviting Superintendent Ch'en over for tea.
attributes.name: Infected Thug

attributes.content: Then let Brother Sam know that the Rat King is inviting Superintendent Ch'en to tea as well. If Brother Sam wants her company, he needs to go through the Rat King first.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Infected Thug

attributes.content: I don't mind wiping the floor with the lot of you and telling him myself, either.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Okay, okay, we get it! She's all yours!
attributes.name: Infected Thug

attributes.content: Let's go!
attributes.name: Infected Thug

attributes.content: Miss Lin...
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Your mother is fine. Don't worry.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Thank you!
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: But Superintendent Ch'en...
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: You don't need to worry about her. I'm actually bringing her to see the Rat King. That said...
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What a pathetic sight, Ch'en Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: So you're going back to become a cop?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: A cop?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wow. I always thought you had the look of a girl who could give a good beating to a hooligan. I've got a gift!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You're getting ahead of yourself. But the police...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's not a bad idea.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It'd probably be a great place to pick up clues about what happened back then, and what's happening now... I wouldn't have to rely on my old schemer of an uncle.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.text: Back in Victoria, I studied a lot. I got the highest marks in every single subject. I barely had any fun at all.
I didn't want to rely on him.
But am I relying on him, after all?

attributes.content: How did she...?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: *Sigh*... This, too, is fate. I've informed Wei Yenwu already.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Dad, this is nothing but trouble. Are you sure you want to bring her under your protection?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Even if she wasn't Yenwu's niece, I would've done the same. Consider what she's been doing for the slums the past couple years.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: She doesn't know what she's doing. She thinks this will make things better.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: She's certainly not going to turn them worse. In fact, things could actually improve.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I would've been much smarter about it.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: But could you honestly do any better?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Now go. You've stuck your hands in this. Might as well lend one to the L.G.D.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: And go knock some sense into Ah Sam.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Err...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Where am I...?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Uncle Lin?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't be so surprised. I sent you help, after all.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Where's Phal?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: He's fine, and so is his mother.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The L.G.D.'s moving into the slums. I suppose you won't blame me for not interfering?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I understand your position. I'm actually very thankful that you've stepped back.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hohoh. Lungmenites all say Ch'en Hui-chieh is a stubborn one. The way I see it, you just don't want to bend to them.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Thank you for the compliment.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If I had the time, I would love to continue our conversation, but I'm still on a mission for the L.G.D., so please...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, you can't go just yet.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: And why not...?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hui-chieh, you know my history with Wei Yenwu, so I'll call you Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Normally, an explosion of that size would not have knocked you out.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Do you know why you fainted?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Because... there was too much going on in my mind. I couldn't react in time.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's part of it, but there's another reason...
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Do you know you're Infected?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I'm sorry I couldn't protect you, Ch'en.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: My crystals blocked most of it, but some shrapnel got through. I'm guessing some of it hit you... am I right? Let's take it quick. You might still make it out of this.
attributes.name: Nine

attributes.content: That's when it happened.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No wonder I haven't been able to exert much strength lately.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It was both the physiological changes brought on by Oripathy and your burnout. You've long been a ticking time bomb. All the explosion did was trigger that bomb along with it.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I've already sent someone to help the L.G.D. and inform them what happened. You needn't worry.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: We don't get the chance often. Come take a walk with an old man, Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en!
attributes.name: Slum Child

attributes.content: Ah Lam? Oh... School's out already, isn't it?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yep!
attributes.name: Slum Child

attributes.content: Have you been keeping up in school?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yep! You told me to study hard, and I listened!
attributes.name: Slum Child

attributes.content: Good girl.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm taking my brother to lunch now. Come visit us next time. I'll tell you all about the things I learned.
attributes.name: Slum Child

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You've been paying for the education of some two dozen children with your own salary.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You even spend time offering them guidance and wisdom after work.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Most are outstanding kids, much thanks to you.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: It's what I should do.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hui-chieh, if it wasn't for everything you've done in the slums the past two years, I wouldn't have come see you, and you would never have met the Rat King.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You can walk with me today because you're pushing the new Infected housing plan. Because you're moving the L.G.D. into the slums, to assimilate them into Lungmen.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Not because you're Wei Yenwu's niece, or because he taught you how to wield Chi Xiao, much less because you graduated from the Victorian Royal Guard Academy.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: No matter what Wei Yenwu thinks, I'll tell you this. You've done well.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en, what are you doing here, chumming it up with the Rat King?
attributes.name: Infected Slum Dweller

attributes.content: She's just taking a walk with an old man.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Oh, I see...
attributes.name: Infected Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Right, Superintendent Ch'en. The Oripathy suppressant you gave me last time really feels like it's working. I felt much better the last time I had a flare up.
attributes.name: Infected Slum Dweller

attributes.content: That's good. I...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't tell me you'll bring me more. There's no way I can repay you.
attributes.name: Infected Slum Dweller

attributes.content: I probably won't ever be able to repay you for the ones you've already brought me.
attributes.name: Infected Slum Dweller

attributes.content: I'll just ration them.
attributes.name: Infected Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Oh, Superintendent Ch'en, I heard the housing plan didn't pass. Don't let it get to you. I figured it was an uphill battle from the beginning.
attributes.name: Infected Slum Dweller

attributes.content: A lot of people in the slums think it's all just a crowd-pleasing trick. They think you promoted a cause you knew was never going to happen just to earn yourself some fame. I don't think so, though.
attributes.name: Infected Slum Dweller

attributes.content: You helped me. I know you're doing this because you truly care for us, and I know it must really weigh on you.
attributes.name: Infected Slum Dweller

attributes.content: I heard the L.G.D. was moving into the slums today. I wanted to tell you this, and I figured I'd maybe run into you. I didn't actually expect to see you here, though.
attributes.name: Infected Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't thank me. I'm the one who should thank you.
attributes.name: Infected Slum Dweller

attributes.content: I gotta head to the construction site for work. I'll see you later.
attributes.name: Infected Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Take care of yourself.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: There are plenty of Infected who accepted your kindness.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Their lives are a little better than the other Infected, but there's a limit to how much better things can be.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Which is why I want to change something about all this, on a fundamental level.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hui-chieh, Lungmen is a great city, don't you think?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Compared to some other places I know, it's a decent place.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But I wouldn't call it a great place.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Because you think it could be even better.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: And I feel the same when I look at you.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But there is only one Ch'en Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You want to convince me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What is there for me to convince? The road ahead is yours to choose yourself.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: That said, your road isn't Lungmen's or the L.G.D.'s. It's not Yenwu's either.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You have those who believe that you, Ch'en Hui-chieh, are a kindhearted person that treats the Infected well. But how are you going to make them believe in the daughter of the Schwire family?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I have had some dealings with Hoshiguma, and I can't even vouch for her, much less the officers who work for you.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You say you want fundamental change, but that is not something you can accomplish on your own.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: How will you persuade others to believe what you represent? How will you make them believe that what you represent has the strength you believe it does, Hui-chieh?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: This way.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en!
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Phal?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I... I'm sorry, Superintendent Ch'en.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: This is all my fault.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: No, it's not.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm glad you're alright. I wouldn't know how to face Madame Oni.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Same goes for you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But really, Superintendent Ch'en, everything I said to you, I meant every word.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: The L.G.D. shouldn't have come. You're not going to accomplish anything.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: It's still too early to shine a light on the slums.
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: Rat King, what's the meaning of this?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's very simple.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: No matter the case, he helped the Anchors, and it got you hurt.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You don't know it, but he's connected to several gangs here.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Take him with you, and you will actually learn quite a lot from him.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But I cannot allow the L.G.D. to take one of my boys before my very eyes.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Otherwise, how would I ever be able to face my friends?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: That's why you must make a decision now, Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: If you take Phal with you, then we never took this walk together today.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You are free to continue your life as an upstanding citizen.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: If you don't take Phal, you can leave the L.G.D. and come work for me.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You might remember my daughter, Yüshia. She could use someone her age, someone she can get along with, someone to help her out. I'm sure she'd be happy to see you too.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Lin Yühsia... I'm not so sure about that.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You needn't worry. I'll sort things out with Yenwu.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Are you... recruiting me?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Will Yenwu let an Infected stay in the L.G.D.?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You don't have many options, Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.text: I understand the Infected predicament well enough.

attributes.content: Sir, I am referring to the incident that took place roughly ten years ago when the city was infiltrated by foreign forces. Several Lungmen citizens were kidnapped, and they are yet to be found.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I will continue to push the city to investigate and locate the missing citizens after my admission to the department.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ch'en... You have no idea what you are talking about.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Sir, I am perfectly aware of what I am talking about.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I won't argue. How about this, then? As soon as you don't think you can keep it up, just let me know.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Tell me, Superintendent Ch'en. How long do you want to be in the department?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.text: Is this as far as I can go?
I haven't found her, and I haven't done anything to make this city a better place.
Is it really okay to give up like this?

attributes.content: I won't take Phal in. He didn't mean to hurt me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en...
attributes.name: Slum Dweller

attributes.content: But let's forget we took this walk together.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You can drop the act. Since you saved me, I'm sure Wei Yenwu already knows that I'm Infected.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's only a matter of whether I tell him about it myself.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hohoh, things aren't quite so transparent between me and Yenwu.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Though it's true that this isn't an easy thing to hide.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I don't know what he thinks, but if I can stay in the L.G.D., I will keep doing my job.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If I can't, I'll find another way.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm sure there is a lot that I could accomplish working for you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But that is not my way.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No need to apologize, Hui-chieh.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You aren't willing to give up yet. I won't say this is a good thing, as the path you have chosen is one without a future.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: But you're still young. You have time to figure things out.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Hey, Ch'en, are you okay there?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hoshiguma? I'm fine. Just ran into a situation.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Okay, looks like Missy's friend wasn't pulling our leg.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: We're almost done over here. As for our next step, though. That's for you to decide.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm on my way.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Thank you for everything, Uncle Lin.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No need to thank me. Thank yourself.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Look, Yenwu. It's like you two are both cut from the same cloth.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: That's not a good thing.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Now you say this is not a good thing.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: I'm curious. Can an Infected run this city?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: If that's what she wants to do, I'm sure she can.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: There are certain things you should tell her yourself.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: If I told her myself, she wouldn't listen.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: That doesn't sound like something an elder who pushed all his arrangements back the moment he heard his niece was Infected would say.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: If you don't do something about yourself soon, she will never understand you.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: It's not me that she doesn't understand. It's the rules, the shackles.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: And since she doesn't have the strength to break free of them, she won't ever need to understand me.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Yet you hope she has that strength, and you're forging the sharpest blade for her. A blade called Lungmen.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: We walked all those years together, smiling until the very end, Kojui.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But do any of us really want anyone to repeat the same mistakes we made?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I taught her how to wield a blade, but, in the end, she must wield it herself.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: She needs to learn for herself how wield it. That is the only way the cloud-splitting sword she masters can be different from mine.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Her swordhand should not be the same as this one.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Fate. This is all fate.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: All the things we fought so hard for, they're all being destroyed before we even have the chance to enjoy them.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: You gave Hui-chieh the greatest gift in the world, yet her time is already ticking away.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: Heaven certainly knows how to play a cruel trick. Wouldn't you agree, Old Wei?
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: What Heaven says or does means nothing to me.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But Lungmen will be a more perfect place. That is all I can do right now.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: See, that is why I say you are cut from the same cloth.
attributes.name: Rat King

attributes.content: During the L.G.D.'s first attempt to move into the slums, Ch'en took the opportunity to sweep out several triad elements that had been hiding there.
That is why Ch'en was promoted to Chief of the Special Inspection Unit.
But right when everyone thought the L.G.D. had found its footing in the slums, Ch'en unexpectedly announced the L.G.D.'s retreat from the area.
Most thought their entrance a risky move she took to facilitate the surprise operation that followed.
Half a year later...
Where's Superintendent Ch'en? I got a letter for her.
attributes.name: Policeman A

attributes.content: She went back into her office after pouring another cup of Joe.
attributes.name: Policeman B

attributes.content: Still not going home, huh? What a workaholic.
attributes.name: Policeman A

attributes.content: You said it. Ever since that operation six months ago, she's been pushing herself way too hard.
attributes.name: Policeman B

attributes.content: If she keeps this up, it's really going to wear her out.
attributes.name: Policeman A

attributes.content: What are you two gossiping about?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, Superintendent Ch'en. It's nothing. Here's a letter for you, by the way.
attributes.name: Policeman A

attributes.content: A letter? Let's see...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (It's from Nine?!)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (She... She started working with the Reunion Movement after she got infected?!)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (There's even a number on here...)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: (Reunion...)
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hello... It's me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's been a long time, Ch'en.
attributes.name: Nine
